Reviews.Title: “Excellent”

Reviews.Content: booked tripadvisor recommendations rate highly stayed friend 7 daughter hotel courtyard main road centre rome quiet spotless cleaned daily fresh towels daily 5 minutes walk cavour metro 1 stop termini 5 minutes colisseum food recommendations reception staff spot breakfast patisserie hotel delicious lunch 3 shops fabulous hotel perfect expensive short break thoroughly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Rosetta - a great price in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Lacerda_2
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights october 28th 1st superior hotel service people fine clean comfortable bed bathroom little bad smelling probably coming plumbing location near colosseum fori imperiali price 105 euros night

Reviews.Content: cab driver huge ancient wooden door sidewalk via cavour mistake didnt look hotel door locked buzzer left read hotel rosetta pushed buzzed door walked quiet courtyard found stairs hotel straight entrance family run hotel cheerfully carried bags tiny clean quiet usual double twins pushed sightsee hang luxury hotel size didnt matter price 90 euro reasonable location rome via cavour short walk intersection dei fora imperiale intersection colosseum left forum hill straight street superb restaurant tiny ancient via della madonna del monte hotel called taverna dei fori imperiali found wonderful morning door onto via cavour coffee bar reaching dei fora imperiale sign sticking door bar friendly terrific cappucino euro doors left hotel gelateria tried rome whatever dont try pizzaria street bad pizza dry hard cardboard flavor crust sometimes supper chinese restaurant doors left via cavour hot sour soup six satisfied hotel choice

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Rosetta - best location and service in a budget friendly hotel in Rome!”
Reviews.Author: MiishaMeemers
Reviews.Content: hotel rosetta perfect location practically stones throw colosseum forum palatine hill short walk termini station main road via cavour overlook courtyard actually quiet private decent size basic clean bathroom aged spotless floors sparkled stayed 3 nights cleaned night fresh towels cleaner actually folded pjs pillow hotel secure service received main desk hotel family run outstanding english fantastic beyond ensure stay rome enjoyable hotel means 5star hotel service quality 5star thank wonderful stay rome return definitely stay hotel rosetta

Reviews.Title: “Great stay...clean accommodations, friendly staff, well-priced, strategically located!”

Reviews.Content: stayed rosetta 3 nights start week trip italy nestled inside building enter private court rosetta refuge chaos city day walking touring crowded streets rome dedicated staff recommendations restaurants nearby bus routes sites else inquired help ensure wifes ice pack cold morning evening placing fridge nitpick somewhat negative id beds comfortable world little firm taste anyway wherever stayed italy looking simple cozy stressfree stay rome highly recommend rosetta definitely stay trip

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Hotel”

Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel 1 daughter hotel conveniently located near colosseum connected termini bus stop outside hotel walk metro stop 2 minutes found taking bus termini tourist attractions convenient street busy lot convenience stores restaurants indian food check street hotel staff gentleman desk speak lot english helpful day day decent size condition convenient strongly recommend hotel rosetta considering trip rome

Reviews.Title: “Very good value”

Reviews.Content: family run hotel thats location near ancient roman sites dont serve breakfast street nearby gelateria found travels exceptional meal corner basic bathroom newly renovated bed firm quiet cheap drinks available lobby front desk manned overnight deal

Reviews.Title: “The best option to stay in Rome...”
Reviews.Author: bccosta21
Reviews.Content: spent 4 days lovely location treatment received staff owners try help easy 3 minutes subway clean despite luxury exactly expected future coliseum near hotel francesca support street beautiful acceptable cheap couple stay enjoy city spend thank rosetta

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Jill32
Reviews.Content: hotel rosetta recently renovated clean looking staff friendly helpful located 10 min walk colosseum view alley definitely recommend hotel couple budget

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel near everything in Ancient Rome”

Reviews.Title: “great value”

Reviews.Content: stuck rome days due volcanic ash found hotel 9pm chilly rainy night reservation luckily nice budget hotel familyrun basic location prices staff helpful especially daughter definitely stay
